## <a name="overview"></a>Overview
Research in the ORCS Lab focuses mainly on the development and application of optimisation methods to complex systems; on data science and statistical modeling; and on the applications of computational intelligence to large-scale power and energy systems.

***

## <a name="optim"></a>Optimization

1. Evolutionary Computation and Other Metaheuristics

2. Multi- and Many-Objective Optimization

3. Multicriteria Decision Making

4. Matheuristics

***

## <a name="stats"></a>Statistical Modeling and Inference

1. Experimental Analysis and Comparison of Algorithms

2. Reliability Modeling and Applications

***

## <a name="applications"></a>Applications

1. Power and Energy Systems

2. Aeronautical Systems

3. Transportation Systems

***
